Test Case Description: Register new user with valid data
Test Case Procedure:
1. Create a request in Postman with POST method to https://localhost:5000/api/auth/register
2. Set request body as raw JSON:
{
  "email": "newuser@test.com",
  "password": "Password123!",
  "fullName": "New User",
  "phone": "0123456789"
}
3. Click Send
Expected Results:
Message = "User registration initiated. Please check your email for an OTP to verify your account."
Status = 201
Success = true
Pre-conditions: User does not have an account

Test Case Procedure:
1. Create a request in Postman with POST method to https://localhost:5000/api/auth/register
2. Set request body as raw JSON:
{
  "email": "tenant@test.com",
  "password": "Password123!",
  "fullName": "Existing User",
  "phone": "0123456789"
}
3. Click Send
Expected Results:
Message = "Email already exists and is activated."
Status = 400
Success = false
Pre-conditions: User with email tenant@test.com already exists and is activated
